/* com.innobiz.orange.web.wo.dao.WoOnecAuthDDao.selectWoOnecAuthD */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.ONEC_NO DESC, N.USER_UID DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.ONEC_NO, T.USER_UID, T.AUTH_TYP_CD, T.REGR_UID, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.REG_DT, 120) REG_DT,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.USER_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) USER_NM,
FROM WO_ONEC_AUTH_D T
AND T.ONEC_NO = #{onecNo, jdbcType=BIGINT} AND T.USER_UID = #{userUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ONEC_NO, T.USER_UID
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M ORDER BY ${orderBy}M.ONEC_NO DESC, M.USER_UID DESC
